description:
On the outskirts of one country, Elaina encounters a beautiful flower field with a dark secret. In a different country, she meets a boy gathering happiness in a bottle.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Hana no You ni Karen na Kanojo / Binzume no Shiawase
The Girl as Pretty as a Flower / Bottled Happiness
الفتاة الجميلة كجمال الزهرة / قارورة السعادة
花のように可憐な彼女 / 瓶詰めの幸せ
